title: Arcade Gamer Fubuki
synopsis: Fubuki Sakuragasaki is a Japanese Jr. High school student and an avid player of arcade games, known far and wide for her skills. However, during the Japanese BAG tournament finals, an evil organization rears its ugly head, and for some reason, it's targeted Fubuki as a threat! With the help of her friends, the stranger known only as Mr. Mystery, and special underwear that increases her gaming prowess, Fubuki takes on all challengers as she fights for gamers everywhere!
